title: "KYS"=Ban
body:
I hate seeing those threads all over the place. Just stop saying "KYS" or using a slur and you would be fine.

Edit: I've been seeing a lot of "KYS" today and to be honest I don't report because I believe in second chances. Instead I say "Don't say that you'll get banned" as a warning. If they keep doing it than I'll report.

replies.body: You'd think it'd be easy.

For anyone with an ounce of self control it is... but then we forget the internet makes people feel like gods

>"KYS"=Ban

If only they were consistent in that. I got multiple screenshots of people saying that phrase, and some of them are even still here.

Well, then you need to actually _report_ them. Don't send a report ticket if it happens in-game, or in pre/post game _if the game reaches post-game_ (If someone dodges in lobby, send a ticket in then, of course).

If nobody reports them, the system won't even try to catch it. The system _does not check unless a report is issued_, or unless Riot has some other reason to check the game (Such as if a flag that indicates scripting goes off).

Of course I am reporting them.

Whether it happen ingame or in the post-game chat, I am making a report with a description, every time.

Make sure you're specifying when the behavior occurred, if it didn't occur in-game. Specifically put, in big, capital letters, [SEE POST/PRE-GAME] at the end of it. Don't leave it in the middle of a sentence.

If you notice someone who _has_ done it multiple times, and you're _certain_ they have not been punished, you can always submit a ticket. Riot would rather you didn't do this unless it becomes absolutely necessary, however.

It would be something like:

>Reason for report: [Verbal abuse/Harrassment] 
Said "KYS" to a player in post-game chat.

Yeah, I am specific about _where_ it happened, and _what_ exactly was being said.
Exactly. They seem to laugh off the support tickets as well. Strange that they will back the automated system more than direct evidence.
Its just irritating how if you forget this for **0.5 seconds **and type "kys" in an aram game (turret suicide) you'll most likely be banned.
